ProjSubtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently
PlayableGameInfo: This is a deployed game that can be played in the browser window, or you can follow the link below to the game or source code.
Proj1: This is a hangman concept game but uses stickman instead to be more child friendly. The game uses react native techology along with typescript. Although I didn't pubish it to the Apple App/Google store, but the app is mobile web friendly.
Proj2: This is a Tic Tac Toe game that allows player play with friend or computer.  The game uses react native techology along with typescript. Although I didn't pubish it to the Apple App/Google store, but the app is mobile web friendly.
Proj3: This is Riddles app to view riddles.  The app uses react native techology along with typescript. Although I didn't pubish it to the Apple App/Google store, but the app is mobile web friendly.
Proj4: This is Jokes app to view jokes.  This app is built using Python's Flask framework and Bootstrap.
